short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide or show opponent information on Lichess.org

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lichess Opponent Info Hider is a simple yet powerful Chrome extension designed to help Lichess players focus on their game without the distraction of opponent ratings. Whether you're feeling the pressure of a high-rated opponent or just want to play without knowing your opponent's ranking, this extension gives you the control to hide or show opponent information with a single toggle. 

Perfect for players who want to improve their game without the psychological stress of ratings. Stay focused, play better.
